response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This unique offering is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality that we're confident you'll appreciate deeply. Given its exceptional value and craftsmanship, we're extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $9,500. We believe this is an extraordinary value considering its worth and the benefits it offers. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your collection.", "product_price": 9500}
